data.title: Moses Man The Musical
data.meta_description: THE PRODUCTION Moses Man: A Musical Journey of a Holocaust Survivor had its first workshop at JCCenterstage at the Jewish Community Center in Rochester,  NY on March 30,  2013 with the following cast: -
data.text:
THE PRODUCTION

Moses Man’s first workshop performances premiered at the The Jewish Community Center of Greater Rochester’s CenterStage in March/April 2013.

Producers: Rochester Children’s Theatre and The JCC CenterStage

Director: Deborah Haber

Music Director: Casey Filiaci

Rochester, NY cast, crew and production team:

Marc Cataldi, Sammi Cohen, Katie Fish, Tom Habacker, Cindy Lull Hill, Mary Tiballi Hoffman, Danny Hoskins, Katie Kepler, Bobby Maville, Lana Momano, Fred Nuernberg, Richard Scooter Rosenthal, Scott Scaffidi

Special Thank You: Ralph Meranto, Jeff Gilhart, Dave Marshall, Barbara Appelbaum, Essie Germanow, Judy Kaplan, Rachel Rosen, Mike Pallini, Matt Nersinger, Vicki Duval, Sally Cohen

Moses Man workshop performances at Indiana University at Bloomington, Indiana and Indiana Repertory Theatre in Indianapolis, Indiana in March/April 2014.

Producer: The Gerald and Dorit Paul Artist-in-Residence at the Robert A. and Sandra S. Borns Jewish Studies Program of Indiana University.

Director: Deborah Haber

Music Director: Casey Filiaci

Indiana cast, crew and production team:

Maddie Shea Baldwin, Leah DeWalt, Mia Fitzgibbon, Mark Goetzinger*, Scot Greenwell*, Paul Hansen, Danny Kingston, Alvin J. Morrison, Eric Olson*, Ryan O’Shea, Emily Ristine*, Erin Robson-Smith*, Janice Roger

Special Thank You: Janet Allen, Courtney Sale, Millicent, Wright, Richard J. Roberts, Brian S. Newman, Rabbi Brett Krichiver and Cantor Janice Roger, Mickey & Janie Maurer, Jacqueline & David Barrett, Caryl Schidler

A Very Special Thank You: Judah Cohen and Ruthie & Robert Rifkin

Moses Man Premiere Musical for the 2014 Indiana University Summer Arts Festival in Bloomington, Indiana.

Producer: Jonathan Michaelsen

Director: George Pinney

Musical Director: Ray Fellmen

Musicologist & Ethnologist: Judah Cohen

Dramaturg: Richard J. Roberts

Premiere Musical cast, crew and production team:

Carrie Barton, Joey Birchler, Caitlin Diekhoff, Christian Fary, Mark Goetzinger*, David Gordon-Johnson, Ethan Gresham, Trish Hausmann, Caroline Huerta, Kaitlyn Mayse, Brianna Milan, Andrew Minkin, Noah Moore, Heather Hertling Narducci, Nick Pappas, Nathan Robbins, Topher Rohrer, Kelsey Shaw

* Appeared through the courtesy of Actors' Equity Association, the Union of Professional Actors and Stage Managers in the United States.

Moses Man Moses Man Workshop – Geva Theatre Rochester, NY May 2015

Producer – DEEP Arts

Director – Michael Bush

Musical Director - Don Kot

Set Design - Stephanie Klapper

Production Stage Manager - Jenny Daniels*

Assistant Stage Manager - Adrianna Goethel

Production Assistant - Mandy Hassett

Cast: Rusty Allen, Dave Autovino*, Joanne Borts*, Sammi Cohen, Tess DeFlyer, CJ Eldred*, Sarah Goodman, Tor Hyams, Mark Light-­- Orr*, Brynn Lucas*, Kevin McGuire*, CJ Roche, Lisa Rothauser*, Scott Scaffidi, Oliver Thornton* Special Thanks: Nazareth College, JCC CenterStage Rochester, NY, Dr Ronald and Krista Reed4
